definitions.definition: Of animals , plants , or substances : extremely venomous or poisonous .
Extremely hostile or malicious ; intensely acrimonious .
examples: The politicians were virulent in their hatred of the president.

definitions.definition: Of a disease or disease- causing agent : malignant , able to cause damage to the host .
Of a pathogen : replicating within its host cell , then immediately causing it to undergo lysis .

main_definition: Of animals , plants , or substances : extremely venomous or poisonous .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Extremely hostile or malicious ; intensely acrimonious .
( medicine ) Of a disease or disease- causing agent : malignant , able to cause damage to the host .
( microbiology ) Of a pathogen : replicating within its host cell , then immediately causing it to undergo lysis . [from 1953]
